skill.s1.name: Inferno Blast
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] as [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy, with a [color=#ff3b1d][b]100%[/b][/color] base chance to inflict [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color].

If the target is inflicted with [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color], gains 1 additional stack of [color=#ad3b36][b][Martyr][/b][/color] and changes skill effects: Deals half damage to all enemies, with [color=#ff3b1d][b]100%[/b][/color] base chance to inflict [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color] to all enemies.
skill.s2.name: Burning Heart
skill.s2.description: Deals [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] as [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies.

If there is any enemy inflicted with [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color], gains 2 stacks of [color=#ad3b36][b][Martyr][/b][/color] and inflicts any enemy with [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color] with [color=#d5a394][b][Sacred Flame][/b][/color], deals [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire TECHNICAL[/b][/color].
[color=#d5a394][b][Sacred Flame][/b][/color]: At the start of the turn, take [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] as [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.s3.name: Purifying Flame
skill.s3.description: Deals [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] as [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy, deals [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire TECHNICAL[/b][/color], if the enemy is inflicted with [color=#d5a394][b][Sacred Flame][/b][/color], additionally triggers [color=#ff3b1d][b]TECHNICAL[/b][/color], increases skill damage by [color=#ff3b1d][b]30%[/b][/color].
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Increases all enemies' [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color], then deals [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] as [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, with a [color=#ff3b1d][b]100%[/b][/color] base chance to inflict all enemies with [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.p1.name: Gift
skill.p1.description: For every 1 stack of [color=#ad3b36][b][Martyr][/b][/color], increase the [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] Taken and Elemental Ailment [color=#ff3b1d][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken for enemies with [color=#d5a394][b][Sacred Flame][/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.p2.name: Miracle
skill.p2.description: Increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] Dealt based on Key's [color=#ff3b1d][b]Max HP[/b][/color].
For every [color=#ff3b1d][b]300 Max HP[/b][/color] increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]1% Fire DMG[/b][/color], up to [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: Will of Sacrifce
awareness.a0.description: When using skills, gain 1 stack of [color=#ad3b36][b][Martyr][/b][/color].
[color=#ad3b36][b][Martyr][/b][/color]: Increase all allies' [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] Dealt by [color=#ff3b1d][b]5%[/b][/color].
Each stack of [color=#ad3b36][b][Martyr][/b][/color] count down independently.
When using skills, Key consumes [color=#ff3b1d][b]4%[/b][/color] current [color=#ff3b1d][b]HP[/b][/color] for 2 turns (max 5 stacks).
awareness.a1.name: Stacking Fear
awareness.a1.description: At the start of Key's turn, for every 1 stack of [color=#ad3b36][b][Martyr][/b][/color], there is a [color=#ff3b1d][b]12%[/b][/color] fixed chance to inflict 1 random enemy with [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color].
awareness.a2.name: Repent, Sinner
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s1][color=#e1ac4c][b][u][Inferno Blast][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lv. +2[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=s2][color=#e1ac4c][b][u][Burning Heart][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lv. +2[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a3.name: Paranormal Event
awareness.a3.description: At the start of Key's turn, increase own [color=#ff3b1d][b]DMG[/b][/color] Dealt by [color=#ff3b1d][b]8%[/b][/color] for every enemy inflicted with [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color] for 1 turn, up to 3 enemies.
awareness.a4.name: Exorcism
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s3][color=#e1ac4c][b][u][Purifying Flame][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lv. +2[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=hl][color=#e1ac4c][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lv. +2[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: Holy Story
awareness.a5.description: [ref=hl][color=#e1ac4c][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: Additionally increase the target's [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#ff3b1d][b]30.8%[/b][/color].
awareness.a6.name: Salvation
awareness.a6.description: For every 10 stacks of [color=#ad3b36][b][Martyr][/b][/color] gained, increase all allies' Fire [color=#ff3b1d][b]DMG Dealt[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]30%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
